EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_CF Summit US_Philadelphia_Q119.CF Summit Email - 3/12/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit and Save 20% Off Your Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]> Cloud Foundry Summit North America is around the corner and we want you to be there! <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=na19&utm_content=content]]>
The tech world is evolving. And the pace of change is picking up. Microservices. Containers. Automation. And now, serverless computing. How can you keep your skills sharp, and deliver for your organization?
Learn and share alongside several of your peers at this year’s Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=na19&utm_content=content]]> in Philadelphia- where the global community meets to deep dive on the open source cloud application platform. Check Out the Agenda <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event_subpages/cfna2019-schedule/?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=na19&utm_content=content%20(optional)]]>
Pivotal will also be at the event to lead talks on a host of topics. We’re sponsoring the CF 101 track, and also contributing sessions on continuous delivery, modernizing legacy apps, serverless programming, running platforms effectively, using Kubernetes at scale, and more.
Choose from 100+ sessions <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event_subpages/cfna2019-schedule/?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=na19&utm_content=content%20(optional)]]> and breakouts across several topic-based tracks.
Highlights include:
- Jai Schniepp, Director of Product, Secure DevOps Platforms, Liberty Mutual - Denise Yu, Software Engineer, Pivotal - Karun Chennuri, Sr. Engineer, Security Architecture, T-Mobile - Nithya Ruff, Sr. Director, Open Source Practice, Comcast - Jay Piskorik, Director of Platform Engineering, Dick’s Sporting Goods
Register today <[[http://www.cvent.com/d/gbq406/4W?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=na19&utm_content=lp]]> and use the Pivotal discount code CFNA19PIVO20 to get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit North America pass. We hope to see you there! Thank you, The Pivotal Team
